tool_description: Generates personalized HTML and text email content for order confirmations and receipts using customer data and order details.

order_date.description: Date and time of the order

template_type.description: Type of email template: confirmation, receipt, shipping

include_items.description: Whether to include detailed item list in email

brand_logo_url.description: URL to brand logo for email header

error_messages: Invalid email address: Provide a valid email address format
Invalid template_type: Must be one of [confirmation, receipt, shipping]
Invalid currency: Currency must be a valid 3-letter ISO code
Invalid language: Language must be a valid 2-letter language code
Invalid date format: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format
Template generation failed: Unable to generate email template due to missing required data
usage: Provide customer details, order information, and template_type. Optionally specify language, tracking info, and branding elements. The tool generates both HTML and plain text email content.

content_language.description: Language code of the generated content
